channel.title: MoparScapes Hall of FAQ
channel.description:
[font=trebuchet ms][b][size=14pt]RSPS FAQ[/size][/b] [b]Q: What language is the best to learn for an RSPS?[/b] A: Java http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/
[b]Q: No one seems to be helping me with my questions, what should I do?[/b] A: PM a Server Helper and hope for a reply
[b]Q: Where can I advertise my server?[/b] A: At the server status page http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
[b]Q: I have a good knowledge of Java, what blank server should I use?[/b] A: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427654.0.html]These[/url]
[b]Q: I have windows 7 and I've read the How to start a server topic but I can't find where to set my Environmental Variables[/b] A: Open the start menu and right click "Computer" and then Properties, scroll down and it should say Change Settings on the right side. And a menu should open, on the top where the tabs are click advanced and then Environment Variables
[b]Q: How can I change the ip on my server?[/b] There is a few files on different types of servers, ill just name them. client.java | applet_sub1 | server.bat (This is most of them if I am still up to date, haven't seen server/client files in some time)
[b]Q: Code from a deltascape source isn't compatible with a project insanity source, what do I do?[/b] A: The reason why the code from one source would not be compatible from one source to another is because the methods are different for each source. You simply need to convert it.
[b][size=14pt]MineCraft FAQ[/size][/b] [b]Q: How can I download the cracked version?[/b] A: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,473399.0.html
[b]Q: How do I install texture packs[/b] A: When you download the texture pack it should be .zip So open the MineCraft launcher and on the main menu it should say "Mods and Texture Packs" and then "Open texture pack folder" and place the .zip file there.
[b]Q: What are the colors on peoples names mean?[/b] A: Green = VIP | Cyan = Moderator | Red = Admin
[b]Q: My house/property was griefed (destroyed by someone else). What should I do?[/b] A: You can't really report them without proof as in a picture of them griefing. Best thing is rebuild it with security.
[b]Q: It says I don't have the right version of MineCraft to be able to play the MoparScape Server, where can I download this version?[/b] A: Downgrade your client version to 1.1_02 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,475111.0.html
[b]Q: How can I reset minecraft, because I edited something in the Bin folder and stuffed it up[/b] A: Delete the Bin folder and then open the launcher and it should download the packages again.
[b][size=14pt]Programming FAQ[/size][/b] [b]Q: What is better? Netbeans or Eclipse?[/b] A: Personally I would recommend Eclipse but thats just my opinion. Both of them could be evenly matched.
[b]Q: What programming language should I first learn?[/b] A: The easiest would be Visual Basic and C++ would probably be the hardest to learn from scratch. My best bet would be Java because of its simplicity.
[b]Q: Where can I learn some languages?[/b] A: Here are some tutorials: [url=http://www.w3schools.com/]HTML, PHP, JavaScript and CSS[/url] | [url=http://www.cprogramming.com/tutorial.html]C and C++[/url] | [url=http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/]Java[/url] | [url=http://visualbasic.freetutes.com/]Visual Basic[/url] (may not guarantee success)
[b][size=14pt]Other[/size][/b] [b]Q: How do I get a TOS like the one here?[/b] A: You don't need one, if you don't know how to make one then you don't need one or if you must http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,477421.msg3494040.html#msg3494040
[b]Q: What are a few good free webhosts I can use[/b] A: http://000webhost.com/ | http://unlimitedmb.com/ | http://www.110mb.com/ | http://x10hosting.com/
[b]Q: How do I get to be MoparScape Veteran or Community Member?[/b] A: MoparScape Vets get voted in by other vets in a poll. The ratio of 'yes' votes to 'no' votes must be at least 2:1. Community Members must have at least 50 rep on mitb.com
[b]Q: If I can't find something related to a problem that I'm receiving, what should I do?[/b] A: You should look in the Help Section board, people may of asked the same question numerous of times.
[b][size=14pt]Evils Questions about VPSes[/size][/b] [quote="Evil_, post:1, topic:379131"]From now on, all questions regarded Virtual Private Servers, or anything of the sort, should be in this topic. There's an overflow of topics asking for help/where they should get one, and it's taking up too much space.
Also, feel free to suggest good places to get a VPS at, and I will make up a list for people to see to help them decide where to obtain their VPS.
[url=http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=621002]What to look for in a VPS[/url] [url=http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=466323]Understanding what a VPS is[/url] [url=http://www.openna.com/pdfs/John_Holbrook_GSEC.pdf]Setting up a basic LAMP[/url]
[b]Reputable VPS providers[/b] ([i]Will update[/i]) [url=http://burst.net/linvps.shtml]Burst.net[/url] - Linux plans start at $5.95 [url=http://x10vps.com]x10vps[/url] - Linux plans starting at 7.95 (I have personally used this one myself, it's pretty good -- Evil_) [url=http://www.hostv.com/vps-hosting.shtml]Hostv[/url] - Linux plans start at $19.99 [url=http://www.wiredtree.com/managedvps/]Wiredtree[/url] - [b]Managed[/b] plans start at $49.99
[b]Places to look for VPS providers[/b] [url=http://www.webhostingtalk.com/forumdisplay.php?f=104]Webhostingtalk[/url] - One of the most active web hosting boards, A perfect place to search for providers and reviews. [url=http://www.google.co.uk/webhp?hl=en#hl=en&xhr=t&q=linux+vps+hosting&cp=10&pf=p&sclient=psy&safe=off&site=webhp&source=hp&aq=0&aqi=&aql=&oq=linux+vps+&pbx=1&fp=8fe4bc1dc511388d]Google[/quote]
[center]Thanks to the following for suggesting FAQ: LilXCj Ix Soulcist xI I Vain I
Any other Frequently Asked Question found will be added here[/center]

item.title: MoparScapes Hall of FAQ
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[font=trebuchet ms][size=14pt]RSPS FAQ[/size]
Q: What language is the best to learn for an RSPS?
A: Java http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

Q: No one seems to be helping me with my questions, what should I do?
A: PM a Server Helper and hope for a reply

Q: Where can I advertise my server?
A: At the server status page http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Q: I have a good knowledge of Java, what blank server should I use?
A: These

Q: I have windows 7 and I’ve read the How to start a server topic but I can’t find where to set my Environmental Variables
A: Open the start menu and right click “Computer” and then Properties, scroll down and it should say Change Settings on the right side. And a menu should open, on the top where the tabs are click advanced and then Environment Variables

Q: How can I change the ip on my server?
There is a few files on different types of servers, ill just name them. client.java | applet_sub1 | server.bat (This is most of them if I am still up to date, haven’t seen server/client files in some time)

Q: Code from a deltascape source isn’t compatible with a project insanity source, what do I do?
A: The reason why the code from one source would not be compatible from one source to another is because the methods are different for each source. You simply need to convert it.

[size=14pt]MineCraft FAQ[/size]
Q: How can I download the cracked version?
A: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,473399.0.html

Q: How do I install texture packs
A: When you download the texture pack it should be .zip So open the MineCraft launcher and on the main menu it should say “Mods and Texture Packs” and then “Open texture pack folder” and place the .zip file there.

Q: What are the colors on peoples names mean?
A: Green = VIP | Cyan = Moderator | Red = Admin

Q: My house/property was griefed (destroyed by someone else). What should I do?
A: You can’t really report them without proof as in a picture of them griefing. Best thing is rebuild it with security.

Q: It says I don’t have the right version of MineCraft to be able to play the MoparScape Server, where can I download this version?
A: Downgrade your client version to 1.1_02 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,475111.0.html

Q: How can I reset minecraft, because I edited something in the Bin folder and stuffed it up
A: Delete the Bin folder and then open the launcher and it should download the packages again.

[size=14pt]Programming FAQ[/size]
Q: What is better? Netbeans or Eclipse?
A: Personally I would recommend Eclipse but thats just my opinion. Both of them could be evenly matched.

Q: What programming language should I first learn?
A: The easiest would be Visual Basic and C++ would probably be the hardest to learn from scratch. My best bet would be Java because of its simplicity.

Q: Where can I learn some languages?
A: Here are some tutorials: HTML, PHP, JavaScript and CSS | C and C++ | Java | Visual Basic (may not guarantee success)

[size=14pt]Other[/size]
Q: How do I get a TOS like the one here?
A: You don’t need one, if you don’t know how to make one then you don’t need one or if you must http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,477421.msg3494040.html#msg3494040

Q: What are a few good free webhosts I can use
A: http://000webhost.com/ | http://unlimitedmb.com/ | http://www.110mb.com/ | http://x10hosting.com/

Q: How do I get to be MoparScape Veteran or Community Member?
A: MoparScape Vets get voted in by other vets in a poll. The ratio of ‘yes’ votes to ‘no’ votes must be at least 2:1.
Community Members must have at least 50 rep on mitb.com

Q: If I can’t find something related to a problem that I’m receiving, what should I do?
A: You should look in the Help Section board, people may of asked the same question numerous of times.

[size=14pt]Evils Questions about VPSes[/size]

[quote=“Evil_, post:1, topic:379131”]From now on, all questions regarded Virtual Private Servers, or anything of the sort, should be in this topic. There’s an overflow of topics asking for help/where they should get one, and it’s taking up too much space.

Also, feel free to suggest good places to get a VPS at, and I will make up a list for people to see to help them decide where to obtain their VPS.

What to look for in a VPS
Understanding what a VPS is
Setting up a basic LAMP

Reputable VPS providers (Will update)
Burst.net - Linux plans start at $5.95
x10vps - Linux plans starting at 7.95 (I have personally used this one myself, it’s pretty good – Evil_)
Hostv - Linux plans start at $19.99
Wiredtree - Managed plans start at $49.99

Places to look for VPS providers
Webhostingtalk - One of the most active web hosting boards, A perfect place to search for providers and reviews.
[url=http://www.google.co.uk/webhp?hl=en#hl=en&xhr=t&q=linux+vps+hosting&cp=10&pf=p&sclient=psy&safe=off&site=webhp&source=hp&aq=0&aqi=&aql=&oq=linux+vps+&pbx=1&fp=8fe4bc1dc511388d]Google[/quote]

[center]Thanks to the following for suggesting FAQ:
LilXCj
Ix Soulcist xI
I Vain I

Any other Frequently Asked Question found will be added here[/center]

Read full topic
